senses.sense_definition: An early type of bus, often open-topped and drawn by horses or motorized, used especially for pleasure trips and sightseeing.

examples.text: The local history museum displays a restored <w>charabanc</w> from the 1920s.
Every summer, the villagers would organize a <w>charabanc</w> trip to the seaside.

senses.sense_definition: An elaborate or complex situation, event, or collection of things; often used to mean 'everything' in a specific context.

examples.text: He decided to manage the costumes, the lighting, and the whole <w>charabanc</w> himself.
She was tired of the project and wanted to quit the whole <w>charabanc</w>.

senses.sense_definition: To travel or transport people using a charabanc.

examples.text: The tourists <w>charabanced</w> through the countryside enjoying the open air.
We <w>charabanced</w> to the coast for our annual holiday excursion.
